markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 339 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5), [Pazuzu](/Deities.aspx?ID=79), [Ranginori](/Deities.aspx?ID=106), [Sky Keepers](/Deities.aspx?ID=232), [Wadjet](/Deities.aspx?ID=62), [Ylimancha](/Deities.aspx?ID=132)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

---
**Heightened (7th)** The duration increases to 1 hour.
name: Fly

summary: Cause the target creature to gain a fly Speed.
summary_markdown: Cause the target creature to gain a fly Speed.
text: Fly Source Core Rulebook pg. 339 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Desna, Pazuzu, Ranginori, Sky Keepers, Wadjet, Ylimancha Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 5 minutes --- The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater. --- Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.
